game.name: Draculauras Mr Right
game.description:
Draculaura also has a beautiful heart and she also wants to fall in love with a handsome boy. Her intelligence and elegancy will be sufficient enough to impress any boy. Today there are three boys who want to be her love. You would have to help her pick up the most suitable one and have a memorable date with him in Draculauras Mr Right. A kind of compatibility test is required to help girl to make decision timely. Give answers to several questions to determine which one appeals hers the most!


Should she go with Clawd Wolf, who is the captain of the football team, the basketball team and a renowned member of the track team or choose Garrott du Roque, who is known as a gargoyle with talent for fashion go on her most awaited date? You have to go through a quiz to decide who will be the perfect date partner. Today dress code is chic casual, so try to dress her up accordingly. Your excellent fashion abilities will help you make a right decision. 

Try to complete every task with full of dedications and follow every possible detail to choose the excellent dress for her date in this html5 princess dress-up game! Give your princess a pair of matching shoes, necklaces, earrings, hat and other needful accessories! Do fast as she is waiting for long for her sweet date! Good luck to create the best outfit in our top dressing games for kids that can be played online, no download required!
